Lexeme.title: Lexeme
Lexeme.description: A Lexeme is essentially a word. Homonyms get separate lexemes each.

form.description: Base form of the word, including an apostrophe (') for the accent. This makes it impractical for searches.

hyphenatiions.description: Comma-separated list of the lexeme's hyphenations. Can be empty

pronunciations.description: Comma-separated list of the lexeme's pronunciations. Can be empty.
